name: Puri Paratha Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Puri Paratha Recipe: Flour ½ kg Salt ½ tsp Ghee 2 tbsp Sugar 1 tbsp
instructions: Mix all together and knead into a soft dough make into balls Now brush with oil, leave covered for few mins. Heat oil make into parathas size of a quarter plate and deep fry. Serve with Tawa Qeema.
